data.title: Admissions & Aid
data.meta_description: The Davenport University admissions team will help you every step of the way, from maneuvering admission requirements to understanding your financial aid options.
data.text:
Start your educational journey at Davenport University

Davenport University admissions team will help you navigate everything from admission requirements to financial aid options.

Whether you’re straight out of high school, an international student, one of our many transfer students, a graduate or adult student returning to college or a veteran, the Davenport University admissions team will help you complete the admission requirements to get you started on your journey at Davenport.

Explore this page for Davenport University admissions information as well as financial aid information, including financial aid options. If you don’t see what you’re looking for, reach out to us anytime at info@davenport.edu or 800.686.1600.

Davenport University admissions information

It goes without saying that the questions an international student has are different than those of transfer students. The same is true for those seeking undergraduate admissions versus graduate admissions. So that we can best serve you and answer your questions about admission requirements and more, choose one of the following categories below that best describes you.

Have you previously attended Davenport but did not complete your degree? Click here

Financial aid options and more

Maneuvering the various financial aid options can feel overwhelming. Relax — we’ve got you. Every year, Davenport connects 92% of our students with some type of financial aid options, from scholarships to grants. In fact, Davenport offers more than 250 foundational scholarships thanks to our generous donors. Our goal is to help you build the best financial aid package possible so that you can get to work on what matters to you — your future! But before we can connect you with the financial aid options best suited for you, you have to apply now to Davenport University.
